column4: my programs are constantly crashing (far more than any previous ubuntu version) and some like Grip just don't work right at all.  my sata HD just doesn't work at all, which worked fine before.  there are weird problems with GTK it seems.  Gnome dies & kicks me back to the log in screen once every few days.
this might seem odd, but update the system BIOS if you havent already
ive seen some eird internal-firmware problems cured like that......
like r/w problems on HDD for one
